sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Title } from "../Components/Title"; import Profile from "../assets/pruebaperfil.jpg"; import { faHtml5 } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import "../styles/AboutMe.css"; function AboutMe() { return ( <>
<section className="content"> <div className="img-container"> <img src={Profile} alt="Profile Photo" /> </div> <div className="description-container"> <p> Hello, and welcome to my portfolio! <br /> I'm Alba and I am a frontend developer with a passion for music, art, and design. I have always been drawn to the creative arts, and over the years, I have explored various mediums, from painting and drawing to playing musical instruments. <br /> As a frontend developer, I have found that coding allows me to merge my love for design and logic to create beautiful and functional web experiences. I am particularly interested in user-centered design and creating intuitive interfaces that engage and delight users. In addition to my work as a developer, I have also taught art classes, which has given me valuable experience in working with people and communicating complex ideas in a clear and concise manner. <br /> I find that this experience has also helped me to develop my skills as a frontend developer, as it has taught me the importance of user empathy and understanding the needs of others. In my free time, you can often find me experimenting with new design concepts or working on music compositions. I find that these creative pursuits fuel my development work, as they allow me to explore new ideas and push boundaries. <br /> Thank you for taking the time to learn a bit about me, and I look forward to the opportunity to work with you! </p> </div> <div className="aptitudes-container"> <h2>Aptitudes</h2> {/* <FontAwesomeIcon icon={faHtml5} /> */} <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 384 512"> <path d="M0 32l34.9 395.8L191.5 480l157.6-52.2L384 32H0zm308.2 127.9H124.4l4.1 49.4h175.6l-13.6 148.4-97.9 27v.3h-1.1l-98.7-27.3-6-75.8h47.7L138 320l53.5 14.5 53.7-14.5 6-62.2H84.3L71.5 112.2h241.1l-4.4 47.7z" /> </svg> <span>CSS</span> <span>SASS/SCSS</span> <span>TAILWIND</span> <span>JS VANILLA</span> <span>REACT</span> <span>FIGMA</span> <span>GIT</span> </div> <div className="experience-container"> <h2>Experience</h2> <ul> <li>Doing this....</li> <li>Doing this....</li> <li>Doing this....</li> <li>Doing this....</li> <li>Doing this....</li> <li>Doing this....</li> </ul> </div> <div className="resume-container"> <h2>Resume</h2> <span>file...</span> </div> </section> </div> </> ); } export { AboutMe };
